TITLE: Episode 12 - Artificial Intelligence, Google's Hate Speech Detection, and the We Work IPO
DESCRIPTION: In this episode, Thaddeus and Gary discuss AI's dirty little secret, the We Work IPO, and how Google's hate speech detection is biased against black people.
CONTENT: In this episode, Thaddeus and Gary discuss the dirty little secret about artificial intelligence, the We Work IPO, and how Google's hate speech detectors are biased against black people.
